Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good morning. You're up
early again today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When I see you working so energetically,
it inspires me to work hard too.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Good morning.
<PAGE>
You know, <MYNAME>, I feel like this town
has become much more lively since you
came.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well good morning, <MYNAME>. Thank you for
coming to say hello to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm impressed by how polite you are for
someone your age.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well hello, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Are you going to start your day's work?
If you work hard to give me things to
ship, I'll do my best to transport them.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good morning... Hmm?
<PAGE>
Wait, that's not right. It's already the
middle of the day, isn't it?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well hello, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>How is work on the farm going? Please
keep giving me things to ship. I'll be
rooting for you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well good evening, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Have you finished with your work for the
day? Hehe. I'm sure it's been a long
day. Good luck tomorrow.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well good evening, <MYNAME>. Yawn...
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh my. I'm sorry. It looks like I'm
already sleepy. Haha.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well good evening, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm very happy that you came to visit me
even though it's already so late.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's nice and warm today,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
If you go for a walk when there's nice
weather like this, you'll feel good for
the whole day. You should try it.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The weather's pretty bad
today, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>On a day like today, the best thing to
do is cook. I'm going to use some
delicious apples to make some sweets.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The weather's nice and hot
today, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>On days like today, some of the goods
that I ship get damaged easily, so
carrying them is rather difficult.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. It's too bad that it's
raining today. I don't really feel like
going outside.
<PAGE>
But don't worry. I wouldn't let that get
in the way of me doing my job.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Isn't the weather just
wonderful today?
<PAGE>
I've been feeling fantastic ever since
this morning. I was even full of
excitement as I did the laundry. Hehe.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. You should go home early
today or you'll get all wet.
<PAGE>
It'd be terrible if you caught a cold.
Please take care of yourself.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it's cold today, isn't it? Just
going outside is challenging. Really, I
mean it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You're still young, <MYNAME>, so you don't
feel that way yet. Oh? You think I'm
still young too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh my, you're quite the flatterer,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Today the town is covered
in snow and looking very beautiful. Now
if only it weren't so cold...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh my! <MYNAME>! There's a typhoon today!
It's dangerous to be outside.
<PAGE>
Please go home right away. You should
listen to what your elders say, you
know.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh my! <MYNAME>, What are you doing?
There's a snow storm today! 
<PAGE>
You shouldn't take this snow lightly.
Please go home right away.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, by the way, <MYNAME>, I heard that
you started going out with someone.
Congratulations!
<PAGE>
If you ever need any relationship
advice, feel free to come to me any
time.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are there any apples in this forest? If
only there were, I'd come here every
day. Too bad...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you see any litter in the forest, be
sure to pick it up for the sake of the
animals who live here.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What should I cook for dinner tonight?
Hmm, a full course of apple dishes
sounds pretty good...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I've heard that you can catch a lot of
fish in this river, but is that such a
good thing?
<PAGE>
I don't like fish. They're so slimy!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The mountain air is so refreshing, isn't
it? This is a great place to come to
cheer yourself up.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This place is full of natural beauty, so
it's enjoyable no matter how long you
walk through it. I just love this trail.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's wonderful how well kept your farm
is, <MYNAME>. Please do your best to send
me lots of goods to ship.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very lucky that my customers are
always happy to buy the quality goods
that you provide me with.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Did you hear a sound coming from over in
that shadow? I wonder if it's a ghost...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've heard that the minerals you can dig
up from this mine are high quality.
<PAGE>
After all, I understand that people
sometimes come here just for the
minerals.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is kind of lonely. It'd sure
be nice if it were more lively...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The town has become more lively
recently, hasn't it? I'm happy because
my work has picked up.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town has become much nicer. There
are more people, more houses... And
lots of events are being held.
<PAGE>
It's a very lively town. Everyone looks
so cheerful and full of life.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I had no idea that such a wonderful town
could be built here in this area.
<PAGE>
It's all because of your hard work,
<MYNAME>. Thank you very much.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very lucky that you live in this
town, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I mean, there aren't many people who
have things to ship here...
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Thank you, <MYNAME>. Oh, and you're also
good at making conversation. I'm looking
forward to talking to you more.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love sewing things onto clothes.
<PAGE>
I especially like sewing apple patches
onto my clothes. I can sew one onto your
clothes too if you'd like...
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, are you sure you don't want me to?
It really wouldn't be any trouble for
me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If you change your mind, just let me
know, and I'll gladly sew something on
for you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, is it that strange for me to be
in the shipping business?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>In the shipping business, you get to
meet a lot of different clients, right?
<PAGE>
I love talking, so I always end up
striking a conversation with them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's very fun for me. I don't think
there are many professions that allow
you to chat while you work like this.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My daughter is very prone to spacing
out.
<PAGE>
When I talk to her, it's hard to tell
whether or not she's listening. She can
be a handful sometimes.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've decided to do whatever I can for
the sake of this town.
<PAGE>
I mean, if I plan a local festival or
something, lots of people will come,
right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Then there will be so many people to
talk to. Just thinking about it gets me
excited. Hehe.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I came to this town a long time
ago, it was full of people. But then the
young people went away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Of course, I stayed put because I really
like this town.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No matter who I ship to, everybody likes
your products, <MYNAME>. I'm proud to have
you as a supplier!
<PAGE>
I can guarantee a place for your
products, so please keep producing
more things to ship, okay? Hehe.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! This is apple ice cream, right?
That's my favorite thing in the world!
<PAGE>
The rich fragrance that comes from these
sweet yet sour apples just drives me
mad. Is this really for me?!
<PAGE>
Oh my! What should I do? I'm so happy!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! <MYNAME>, is this for me? Tee-hee.
Thank you very much.
<PAGE>
I love it! I should go show everyone
that you gave this to me.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>, is this for me? Thank you
very much.
<PAGE>
This is a good present. I don't know how
to thank you. It's wonderful to have
good neighbors like you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? Thank you very much,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I-I don't... Oh, never mind. 
Thanks, I'll try it.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you couldn't possibly be giving
this to me... could you?
<PAGE>
I hate this... Oh, this really gets me
down.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Th-That's a coffee pack... The thing
I hate most in this world.
<PAGE>
What? It's for me? Why are you giving me
something that I hate? Sniffle.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! This is so big! I wonder how much
I can sell it for when I ship it.
<PAGE>
What? This is a present for me? Thank
you, <MYNAME>. I'll do my best to make it
into some delicious food.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great job, <MYNAME>! This is going to
fetch a good price! What? It's a present
for me?
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. I appreciate your
thoughtfulness, and I'll savor every
bite.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! This is very big. I wonder how
much I can sell it for when I ship it...
I can't even begin to imagine.
<PAGE>
What, it's a present for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>. I'll do my best to make into
some delicious food.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great job, <MYNAME>! This huge thing is
going to fetch a huge price! What? It's
a present for me?
<PAGE>
Thank you very much. I appreciate your
thoughtfulness, and I'll savor every
bite.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No, no. That's fine. I've got all I need
for today.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can only take so much at a time. Ah,
if I ship it, we can make some money.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! This is apple ice cream, right?
I love apple ice cream!
<PAGE>
Getting something this wonderful on my
birthday is a dream come true. You've
brought tears of joy to my eyes.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm very happy that you're celebrating
my birthday like this, <MYNAME>. Thank you
very much.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remembered my birthday? Thank you
very much. I gladly accept this gift.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? Oh my. Thank you
very much.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You probably didn't know this <MYNAME>,
but today is my birthday...
<PAGE>
I suddenly feel a little sick. Oh no,
it's nothing, please don't worry about
me...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Is this some kind of prank, <MYNAME>? How
could you give me something like this
on my birthday? How terrible of you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Your birthday present for me is a coffee
pack? <MYNAME>, do you hate me or
something?
<PAGE>
I can't think of any other reason why
you would do something like this.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, <MYNAME>, is this a birthday
present for me?
<PAGE>
It's very big. I can tell that you
worked hard on this. Thank you very
much!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my. <MYNAME>, is this big thing my
birthday present? Thank you very much.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Is this for my birthday?
It's very big...
<PAGE>
It's one of the most wonderful things
I've ever seen. I can tell you worked
hard on it. Thank you very much!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my. <MYNAME>, is this huge thing for
me? Is it a birthday present?
<PAGE>
Well, thank you very much. I'll savor
every bite.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! She's very fluffy. She's so cute
I want to take her home with me.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This red cockscomb is very cute. And
even if I touch it, she doesn't run
away. She's a very good girl.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, that's very impressive. I didn't
know chickens could get this big.
<PAGE>
She must have grown to this size thanks
to your loving care, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! The little guy is so tiny and
cute. And what a clever-looking face
that is. I want a dog like this too.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like this guy. Fat, small dogs are
cute in their own way.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, this dog is big and looks very
reliable. I'd like to have a dog like
this as a guard dog.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When a big dog gets this fat, it winds
up looking cute. I could jiggle this guy
around all day.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a cute cat. I like how the
little guy purrs when pet around the
throat. Hehe.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'd never seen a fat cat before. This is
a precious experience.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee. Cats with long fur are cute
too. This cat makes me feel calm and
relaxed.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if this cat has a hard time
walking around with that long hair.
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Look, this guy's body is so round that
it looks like it would be easy to trip.
Supporting it must be hard. How cute!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, is this for me? Oh! What am I to
do?
<PAGE>
This makes me so happy. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, sweets. You shouldn't tease an
older woman like me, you know.
<PAGE>
But even though you're not serious, I
still appreciate this. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, a blue feather. That brings back
memories. How many years has it been
since I received one of those...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my, that's a beautiful ring. I'd like
to get a ring like that one more time,
but I suppose that's just a dream...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, how cute. If only I had a
birdcage at home, I'd love to keep this
bird as a pet.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh my! Is that your pet, <MYNAME>? Oh, 
it's a wild animal?
<PAGE>
It seems very used to you. I'm
impressed.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a big turtle. You're very strong,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Ah, I guess you have to be to run a
farm.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Happy birthday!
<PAGE>
Of course I know it's your birthday!
People around here have been talking
about it lately.
<PAGE>
It's not much, but please accept this
present that I got for you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>, I'm sorry. I heard that
today is your birthday.
<PAGE>
I didn't know, so I wasn't able to
prepare a present for you...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Long time no see. How have
you been?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I worry when I don't get to see you for
a while, so please drop by any time.

... Zzz... zzz... zzz... Yes... zzz...
I understand... zzz... zzz

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yes? Munch, munch... What is it? Munch,
munch... Ah, I'm sorry... I'm eating
right now... Let's talk later.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This red bench is absolutely wonderful.
Red is my favorite color, you know.
<PAGE>
I'd like to have a bench like this for
my own house.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This yellow bench is beautiful. I think
it suits this town perfectly.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This white bench looks comfortable. It
would be the perfect place to sit in a
park in the morning.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a stylish weather vane. I know
of some up on roofs, but this is the
first one I've seen on the ground.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even this run-down cart looks stylish
sitting here casually in a corner of the
town.
<PAGE>
You've got some really good taste.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This wagon is cute. It'd be a fun place
to sell bread from.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice table. We could gather
some neighbors together and have a tea
party here.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice chair. It might come in
handy when we have a lot of guests.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This beach chair looks like it would be
a comfortable place to stare out into
the ocean from.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful garden table.
<PAGE>
It would be fun to throw a party in the
garden.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This beach parasol table looks perfect
for enjoying a cool drink on a summer
beach while looking out onto the ocean.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Beacons are wonderful. They make me feel
like something exciting is about to take
place.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at this fountain. It's nice when a
plaza has a fountain because then you
can play in the water when it's hot.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This fountain is wonderful. It's big,
but the sound of the water is quiet, so
it's a good place for relaxing.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the unique shape of this bridge.
It has an exotic feel to it.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Minecarts look fun. Just riding on those
tracks and ending up somewhere far away
before you know it...
<PAGE>
That's what I think about when I see
this. But there are no tracks here, so
this cart isn't going anywhere.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love daruma. Don't you think they're
cute with those wobbly round bodies of
theirs?
<PAGE>
But this one is huge. It wouldn't
wobble, it would rumble.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a wonderful sound. Is that a bamboo
fountain? Don't you think the sound of
bamboo is mysterious?
<PAGE>
<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>It sounds warm yet also cold,
perplexed yet also clear. It's an
indescribable sound.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the ambiance here. It feels cozy
and neat.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like it here. This wide stone-paved
path is wonderful.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a luxurious atmosphere.
<PAGE>
I like the way everything is arranged
tastefully around the fountain. This
place really puts me in a good mood.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
With that bench there under the street
light, this looks like a good place for
a date.
<PAGE>
If only I were younger... What? I'm
still young enough? You're quite the
flatterer, <MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice little park. It's
peaceful, and it looks like a good place
to go for a walk.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a fantastic park. This is the
type of place where I'd like to sit on a
bench and leisurely read a book.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like pink roses. Don't you think they
look graceful and beautiful?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red roses are my favorite flowers.
<PAGE>
They signal passionate, burning love!
<PAGE>
Oh my, excuse me. Looking at those red
roses made me a little emotional.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like pink roses. Don't you think they
look graceful and beautiful?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red roses are my favorite flowers.
<PAGE>
They signal passionate, burning love!
<PAGE>
Oh my, excuse me. Looking at those red
roses made me a little emotional.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a cute flower basket. I'm
especially fond of red flower baskets.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a wonderful flower basket. The
yellow color of the basket matches well
with the colors of the flowers.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't you think pink flower baskets are
beautiful? They're especially good for
accentuating boldly-colored flowers.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like pine trees because they have
interesting branches.
<PAGE>
Their shape looks different depending
on the angle that you look at them from.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cherry trees are wonderful, aren't they?
You need a single one to some flower
viewing.
<PAGE>
I'm not saying that I want to have a
flower viewing party, just that it'd be
nice to admire the flowers and have fun.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ginkgo trees are beautiful when their
leaves change color. I also like it when
the street is covered in yellow leaves.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are flowers in this tricycle. How
stylish! It takes good taste to pull
this off.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are flowers in this watering can.
How stylish! It takes good taste to pull
this off.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are flowers in this boot pot. How
stylish! It takes good taste to pull
this off.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't you think flower arches are
beautiful? I especially love arches with
red flowers in them.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a red fence here. It's nice to
have red things here and there around
town.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right. Let me give you this
in return. I hope it comes in handy.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right. Let me give you this
in return. I hope it comes in handy.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right. Let me give you this
in return. I hope it comes in handy.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, that's right. Let me give you this
in return. I hope it comes in handy.
Now's not a good time to give a present.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Every town needs a hair salon. It's
something that a woman can't live
without, you know.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I heard that the tailor has some good
fabric, so I had a dress made. I wonder
if it'll look good on me.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I go to the restaurant, I end up
eating too much. I wonder if there's any
food out there that won't make you fat.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you travel much, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Oh, me? No, I just go to the travel
agency to get pamphlets. I'd like to go
somewhere one of these days though...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sweets at the tea house are
delicious. The apple ice cream is
especially irresistible.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving isn't easy, but it can be good to
change your environment sometimes. You
also get to meet new neighbors.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that the town is bigger, there are
more people and business is going well.
Let's keep up the good work.
